content: ह्नु {c2c} <ab>A.</ab> (ह्नुते, ह्नुत) {@--1@} To take away, rob, abstract, deprive (one) of; अध्यगीष्टार्थशास्त्राणि यमस्याह्नोष्ट विक्रमं <ls>Bk. 15. 88.</ls> {@--2@} To conceal, hide, withhold; <ls>Māl. 1.</ls> {@--3@} To hide from any one (with <ab>dat.</ab>); गोपी कृष्णाय ह्नुते <ls>Sk.</ls>
